scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../functions && npm install
scripts.dev:windows: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:functions" "npm run dev:agents"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:functions
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build -- --configuration production
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:functions
scripts.setup:python: cd agents/python && python -m venv .venv && .venv/Scripts/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
